# phoneticFamilyName

**Instance Property**

The phonetic spelling of the contact’s family name.

## Declaration

```swift
DOMString phoneticFamilyName;
```

## Discussion

Typically, you use phonetic names for transactions in Japan.

If your site requires the contact’s phonetic name, include this field in the [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayPaymentRequest/requiredBillingContactFields] or [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayPaymentRequest/requiredShippingContactFields] in your payment request.

Available in Apple Pay version 3. For more information about versions, see [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/apple-pay-on-the-web-version-history].

## Contact properties

- **phoneNumber**: A phone number for the contact.
- **emailAddress**: An email address for the contact.
- **givenName**: The contact’s given name.
- **familyName**: The contact’s family name.
- **phoneticGivenName**: The phonetic spelling of the contact’s given name.
